Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Raw Minerals^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;矿物原料^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: I think maybe you're starting to see how this works. Next?
Texts.Chs: 我想你已经开始明白这是如何工作的了吧，现在让我们继续下一步？

Texts.Eng: Next, why don't you go and fetch 50 ^orange;cobblestone^reset; and toss it in your extractor. ^orange;Raw minerals^reset; should be produced. ^green;Bring 5 to me^reset;.
Texts.Chs: 下一步为什么你不把^orange;50份鹅卵石^reset;丢进你的物质萃取器呢？你应该会得到一些^orange;矿物原料^reset;的。只要将这些原料^green;带给我^reset;就好。
